name: appversion
description: A module for keep track the version, build and commit of your javascript application.

scripts.build:cli: apv update build && babel es6/cli.es6.js --watch --out-file cli.js
scripts.build:index: apv update build && babel es6/index.es6.js --watch --out-file index.js

author: Tomas Della Vedova - @delvedor (http://delved.org)
